body_html: I'm not entirely convinced that this is a good fix. If Pandas has issues with using scalars to index them then it's their problem, and we shouldn't have all users who didn't need this functionality pay for .tolist(). It's really a fairly expensive call.
body_text: I'm not entirely convinced that this is a good fix. If Pandas has issues with using scalars to index them then it's their problem, and we shouldn't have all users who didn't need this functionality pay for .tolist(). It's really a fairly expensive call.
body: I'm not entirely convinced that this is a good fix. If Pandas has issues with using scalars to index them then it's their problem, and we shouldn't have all users who didn't need this functionality pay for `.tolist()`. It's really a fairly expensive call.
